EmailTemplate.description: Using it in Auto Response For Web to Cases
EmailTemplate.name: CoCo
EmailTemplate.subject: Weâ€™ve received your message, Reference: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for contacting us! We have received your message and our Guest Services team will be reviewing it shortly. While we review the details of your request over the next 72 hours please do not hesitate to reach out to us at the following phone number. You can respond to this email at any point if you have anything additional to share with us. Sincerely, Guest Services Manager -- {!Case.Location__r}
